Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class serverController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.serverController
public class serverController extends Object
It interacts with the server and the gameController, in order to modify the instance of the game.

  • Method Details

    • executeMessage

      public boolean executeMessage(GeneralMessage message) throws RemoteException
      It takes a message from the client and does the requested action. It sends a reply if needed.
      Parameters:
      message - the received message to be elaborated.
      Returns:
      true only if the message is successful, false otherwise. For tests purposes.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • isInAGame

      public boolean isInAGame(Player p)
      It searches a given player in all games.
      Parameters:
      p - player to look for.
      Returns:
      true only if the player is in a game, false otherwise.

    • getMessage

      public Action getMessage(String input) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, RemoteException
      It gets a message from the server, and it calls the method execute.
      Parameters:
      input - message from the server.
      Returns:
      action of the created message only for test purposes.
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      RemoteException

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(GeneralMessage m, String nick) throws RemoteException
      It sends a message to a designated client.
      Parameters:
      m - the message to be sent.
      nick - the client's nickname.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
